label: A3B5C_hP18_194_h_fh_a-001
title: Disordered YBO$_{3}$ Structure
comments:
(Newnham, 1963) found two possible structures for TmBO$_{3}$ and YBO$_{3}$: \begin{itemize} \item This structure, with a compact hexagonal cell and partially disordered boron and oxygen atoms, and \item \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C_hP30_193_g_gk_bd-001}{a completely ordered structure with a larger hexagonal cell}. \end{itemize} ~ \vspace{-.25in} 
 In the current structure only 1/3 of the boron and oxygen (6h) sites are occupied.
